Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Hugging Face Spaces web version

- Add app.py for Hugging Face Spaces deployment
- Update requirements.txt with specific versions
- Enhance .gitignore for web deployment
- Add README_HF.md with HF metadata
- Add HUGGINGFACE_DEPLOYMENT.md deployment guide
- Include sleep mode warning banner in UI

Features:
- 30-minute sleep mode notification
- Improved UI with gradients and user guidance
- Step-by-step deployment documentation
- Security and monitoring best practices

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
